text: Ilie Bria (born 23 March 1989) is a Moldovan cross-country skier. He competed in the men's sprint event at the 2006 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1989 births Category:Living people Category:Moldovan male cross- country skiers Category:Olympic cross-country skiers of Moldova Category:Cross-country skiers at the 2006 Winter Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Ilie Bria
